name: ILRepack
help: ILRepack is meant at replacing ILMerge / Mono.Merge.The former being closed-source (now open-sourced), impossible to customize, slow, resource consuming and many more. The later being deprecated, unsupported, and based on an old version of Mono.Cecil.Here we're using latest (slightly modified) Cecil sources (0.9), you can find the fork here. Mono.Posix is also required (build only, it gets merged afterwards) for executable bit set on target file.

properties.name: KeyFile
properties.help: Specifies a keyfile to sign the output assembly.

properties.name: KeyContainer
properties.help: Specifies a key container to sign the output assembly (takes precedence over <c>--keyfile</c>).

properties.name: LogFile
properties.help: Enable logging (to a file, if given) (default is disabled).

properties.name: Version
properties.help: Target assembly version.

properties.name: Union
properties.help: Merges types with identical names into one.

properties.name: NoDebug
properties.help: Disables symbol file generation.

properties.name: CopyAttributes
properties.help: Copy assembly attributes (by default only the primary assembly attributes are copied).

properties.name: Attr
properties.help: Take assembly attributes from the given assembly file.

properties.name: AllowMultiple
properties.help: When <c>--copyattrs</c> is specified, allows multiple attributes (if type allows).

properties.name: Target
properties.help: Specify target assembly kind (<c>library</c>, <c>exe</c>, <c>winexe</c> supported, default is same as first assembly).

properties.name: TargetPlatform
properties.help: Specify target platform (v1, v1.1, v2, v4 supported).

properties.name: Xmldocs
properties.help: Merges XML documentation as well.

properties.name: Lib
properties.help: Adds the path to the search directories for referenced assemblies (can be specified multiple times).

properties.name: Internalize
properties.help: Sets all types but the ones from the first assembly <c>internal</c>.

properties.name: InternalizeExcludeFile
properties.help: Exclude file contains one regex per line to compare against fullname of types NOT to internalize.

properties.name: RenameInternalized
properties.help: Rename all internalized types.

properties.name: DelaySign
properties.help: Sets the key, but don't sign the assembly.

properties.name: AllowDuplicate
properties.help: Allows the specified type for being duplicated in input assemblies.

properties.name: AllowDuplicateResources
properties.help: Allows to duplicate resources in output assembly (by default they're ignored).

properties.name: ZeroPekind
properties.help: Allows assemblies with Zero <c>PeKind</c> (but obviously only IL will get merged).

properties.name: Wildcards
properties.help: Allows (and resolves) file wildcards (e.g. <c>*.dll</c>) in input assemblies.

properties.name: Parallel
properties.help: Use as many CPUs as possible to merge the assemblies.

properties.name: Pause
properties.help: Pause execution once completed (good for debugging).

properties.name: RepackDrop
properties.help: Allows dropping specific members during merging (#215).

properties.name: Verbose
properties.help: Shows more logs.

properties.name: Output
properties.help: Target assembly path, <c>symbol/config/doc</c> files will be written here as well.

properties.name: Assemblies
properties.help: Primary and other assemblies to be merged.
